room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: Super fun time at the Great Escape Room. Definitely got our money's worth and even though we didn't escape the Library it was a blast!  Short walk from Market Square so this is a great dinner and a date night combo.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: Our group of 9 had a fantastic experience with Zach yesterday! I've done several escape rooms throughout Pittsburgh and this was one of my favorites. The Library was challenging but not impossible. We had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: This was the fourth escape room for our team. We've been to several locations around Pittsburgh and this was by far the best, even though we didn't escape. Noah was a great host. The clues are very challenging! We can't wait to come back and try Moriarty's Gameroom.
